wiki.summary: Miles Davis (tr), John Coltrane (ts), Julian "Cannonball" Adderley (as), Bill Evans (p), Paul Chambers (b), Jimmy Cobb (d)

name: On Green Dolphin Street
comments: My favorite version is by Red Garland
I appreciate this very much so.
I wish more people appreciated this.
This track remains one of my favorite examples of "real" smooth jazz.  Classic in every sense.

Miles Davis trumpet
Julian "Cannonball" Adderley alto saxophone (3,5)
John Coltrane tenor saxophone
Bill Evans piano
Red Garland piano (5)
Paul Chambers bass
Jimmy Cobb drums
Philly Joe Jones drums
It sure is Bill Evans on Piano ... the same line up as is on Kind of Blue
Is that Bill Evans on piano?
